channel.title: CVE Feed for Jenkins project -- Jenkins P4 Plugin
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Jenkins project -- Jenkins P4 Plugin

item.title: CVE-2020-2142|2024-08-04T07:01:40.958Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20p4%20plugin
item.description: A missing permission check in Jenkins P4 Plugin 1.10.10 and earlier allows attackers with Overall/Read permission to trigger builds.

item.title: CVE-2020-2141|2024-08-04T07:01:41.195Z -- jenkins%20project -- jenkins%20p4%20plugin
item.description: A cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Jenkins P4 Plugin 1.10.10 and earlier allows attackers to trigger builds or add a labels in Perforce.
